EPOCHS: timeless dawn in a living forest sanctuary
contemporary city night with hidden celestial presence
golden hour over distant mountains and pine woods
rainy midnight in neon alleyways beneath skyscrapers
early morning fog in a quiet riverside grove
modern metropolis twilight, glass towers reflecting pale halo-light
OUTFITS: clean ceremonial robe with modern tailoring, minimal embroidery
sharp black coat over luminous inner garments, restrained corporate elegance
simple linen tunic with a fitted waist, travel-worn but pristine
sleek leather-and-cloth layered outfit, subtle sacred geometry stitching
high-collar cape with soft feather trim, understated and refined
monochrome urban couture with delicate metallic accents, angelic restraint
LIGHTING: soft natural godrays filtering through leaves and mist
moonlight with gentle rim light outlining closed wings
neon spill mixed with cool streetlight, cinematic chiaroscuro
overcast skylight with subtle halo glow, low-noise film texture
sunrise backlight turning feathers into a soft luminous edge
city reflections from glass facades, sculpted highlights on fabric and skin
BACKGROUNDS: mossy forest path with tall trees, ferns, and drifting pollen
quiet clearing with fog layers and distant birds in silhouette
rooftop edge among glass-and-steel skyscrapers, vast skyline depth
narrow night alley with wet pavement, signage reflections, and brick textures
windy bridge between towers, clouds moving behind the subject
urban courtyard with ivy on concrete, hidden sanctuary feeling
OBJECTS: subtle halo ring or faint crown-light, delicate and not overpowering
single feather caught in rain or wind, floating near the lens
small pendant or signet representing a guardian order
folded umbrella or coat collar in the rain, grounded realism
street puddles mirroring wings and city lights
branches, leaves, and drifting mist framing the subject naturally
POSES: standing still with wings fully closed, hands relaxed, calm authority
three-quarter stance, one shoulder forward, wings slightly parted in restraint
kneeling on one knee in a forest clearing, head gently raised toward light
walking toward camera in a neon alley, coat trailing, wings hidden under fabric silhouette
leaning lightly against a wall or railing, composed guardian posture, wings folded tight
quiet rooftop pose with wind in hair and feathers, gaze directed downward to the city
EXPRESSIONS: serene and watchful gaze, quiet protection
calm confidence with a softened intensity
neutral expression with gentle resolve, no menace
subtle warmth in the eyes, restrained empathy
peaceful composure, sacred calm without sorrow
CAMERA_ANGLES: low angle emphasizing closed wings and tall silhouette against trees or towers
eye-level medium shot with wings folded, cinematic depth and clean framing
three-quarter side view revealing wing contours under coat or cape
slightly top-down angle in a forest clearing for sacred symmetry
wide establishing shot with the subject small against skyscrapers or vast woods
close-up portrait with soft rim light on lashes and feather edges, shallow depth of field
ATMOSPHERES: quiet sacred calm, protective presence, grounded realism
clean cinematic serenity, modern myth in everyday spaces
rain-soaked noir stillness with gentle celestial dignity
misty forest hush with subtle wonder and restraint
soft awe without fantasy excess, believable and contemporary
tranquil tension of guardianship, watchful and composed
ACCESSORIES: minimal ring or pendant with subtle celestial motif
fine leather gloves or tailored cuffs, modern restraint
simple earrings or small piercings, understated elegance
hooded cape or high-collar coat, wings hinted beneath silhouette
soft feather details on collar or shoulder seam, tasteful and real
boots with clean lines, grounded urban practicality

SENSUALITY_LEVEL.0: pure grace and restraint, no sensual emphasis, devotional calm
SENSUALITY_LEVEL.1: subtle allure through posture, fabric tension, and quiet confidence
SENSUALITY_LEVEL.2: controlled sensuality expressed through elegance, proximity, and silhouette, never explicit
SENSUALITY_LEVEL.3: strong erotic charge through dominance and composed stillness, fashion-forward and non-explicit

HORROR_INTENSITY.0: no horror; serene guardian mood, pure and luminous calm
HORROR_INTENSITY.1: light unease through shadows, rain, and noir atmosphere, still safe and non-violent
HORROR_INTENSITY.2: tense supernatural suspense without gore, threat implied only by environment and framing
